org.apache.hadoop.io

Class MapFile.Writer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.io.MapFile.Writer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayFile.Writer, BloomMapFile.Writer, SetFile.Writer
    Enclosing class:
    MapFile

    public static class MapFile.Writer
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Writes a new map.

        What's the position (in bytes) we wrote when we got the last index

      • lastIndexKeyCount

        private long lastIndexKeyCount
        What was size when we last wrote an index. Set to MIN_VALUE to ensure that we have an index at position zero -- midKey will throw an exception if this is not the case
